items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, very flattering!!!
items.body: I bought this as a gift for my mom. While it has a youthful look it is also doubles for age appropriate clothing. She was all ears. The top was figure fitting and the bottom was flared out to her liking. Really was a great find for her. Read more
items.author: Richie_E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holiday party dress must have!
items.body: The fit is true to size. A bit long but wearing heels helped. Not clingy and nice flow. Read more
items.author: 1bzmom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very attractive sleeveless dress
items.body: Good color, great fabric weight, and for a change, none of the tier skirts design that seem to be the case for so many of the dresses and skirts that I've seen available these days. Sure, I get why: Tiered designs are cheaper to make and more efficient for fabric use, but nothing beats the clean lines of a solid shoulder-to-hem design. I found this dress to be very comfortable, quite warm (but not overly so...but in cold weather, one might wish to wear a shawl or layer clothing with it). On me the fit was great for a medium-size (5' 4" and 137lbs), and not overly long as is too often the case when I buy dresses, skirts, or slacks (I can hem garments, but it's a pain to have to do so). Anyway, great dress, I might get more colors. Read more
items.author: BeccaM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Flattering Dress
items.body: Love this dress! Very flattering on my figure. Fabric is very nice. Great find reasonable price. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fits Well, Front Seam Is a Dealbreaker
items.body: This dress is made from nice quality fabric. Overall construction is good, and you can tell that there is some attention to detail paid to how it was put together. The color is as represented in the listing. As others have mentioned, it is slightly shorter than in the photos. I don't have any issues with that at all, though. I am 5'4" and 110lbs, and the small fits me well. That said, I am not a fan of the seam that runs down the middle of the front. I can't get around that. Some people may not care about that kind of thing, but the front seam is really a deal-breaker for me. Read more
items.author: C. L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for many occasions
items.body: Perfect dress for a more formal and modest occasion. Material is so nice and sizing is accurate! Will buy in more colors!!! Read more
items.author: Patrick Reinschmidt

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric, heavy weighted feel, some personal fit issues
items.body: I have some mixed feelings about this PrettyGarden dress. Let me start with saying that I just do not like the fit. I find the shoulders to be very boxy, and the pleating on the front hangs oddly at the top. I am also not a fan about the length, as it falls mid-shin and sits at a weird spot for someone of my height (5'9, 163 lbs). All that said though, these are personal opinions specific to my body. The fabric is pretty heavy so I would also question the breathability of it as a summer dress, but as a winter, spring, or fall dress the weight is an added bonus. It gives it a polished look. This would look great as office wear or casual dress, but I do not find that it would fit the "semi formal" category as listed in the item title. I also would not call this a maxi dress as it does not fit like one in any real way. Overall, this dress was not right for me, but I can see how it would work well for other women. The weight of the fabric and the movement of that weight would look great on the right person. Use of a Poly-Cotton blend is also an added bonus! At 50% Cotton, 43% Polyester, and 7% Elastane the fabric is likely to last and keep it shape after washing. Read more
items.author: JNob

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress!
items.body: Love this dress. The brown is beautiful in person. It came wrinkled, but easy to steam out. There was a little hole in the first dress I received, but got a replacement quickly. Read more
items.author: D

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Brown, Khaki, Burgundy, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
